long_description: The 16 fl. oz. Sea To Summit Delta InsulMug has a shape that fits easily in your pack so you can enjoy a hot beverage on every adventure. Closed-cell polyurethane skin ups the thermal insulation to keep your drink warm for long periods of time; also enables you to hold the mug without burning your hands. Dishwasher-safe nylon construction is 100% BPA free. Rim of mug stays cool so you can comfortably sip a hot beverage. Handleless design allows mug to stow away easily inside a pack. Features a sip-through lid and a hang loop.
short_description: The 16 fl. oz. Sea To Summit Delta InsulMug has a shape that fits easily in your pack so you can enjoy a hot beverage on every adventure.
